pr_title: Refine Task Framework log format part-1

timeline.bodyText: If we get rid of isDebugEnabled check. Shall we refactor this for the code base? This is not task frame work only behavior.
timeline.author: junkaixue

replies.bodyText: I do think so. Since this check is no longer needed after using slf4j.Logger.
replies.author: xyuanlu

replies.bodyText: Then let's either have a different PR for that. Or let's create a ticket to track that.
replies.author: junkaixue
